---
title: "LogNormal-Results-Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rlnorm-5-1.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
LNorm51Call <- stream_in(file("rlnorm-5-1-Call-Revised-1211.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
LNorm51Result <- stream_in(file("rlnorm-5-1-1211_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
LNormal.5.1.OpenAI <- left_join(LNorm51Call,LNorm51Result)
Full.LNormal.5.1 <- left_join(LNormal51$params, LNormal.5.1.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.LNormal.5.1.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.LNormal.5.1$Outcome <- map_chr(LNormal51$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(LNorm51Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.LNormal.5.1$Outcome)
Full.LNormal.5.1.1211 <- Full.LNormal.5.1
```

```{r}
save(Full.LNormal.5.1.1211, file="Full.LNormal.5.1.1211.RData")
```
